backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing access control, user profiles, photos, and short-link generation and lookup.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding an empty shortLinks map to the stored state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking short‑link sharing and auto‑open functionality to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining warm autumn color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling landing layout, upload permissions, gallery display, and auto-opening photos from short links.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout and clearing cached queries on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with background imagery, headline, and buttons that scroll to upload or gallery sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/Highligh: Highlights section showing three feature cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Renders a sticky header with logo, navigation buttons, and an Internet Identity login button, including smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoGall: Displays photos in a responsive grid with loading, error, and empty states, and supports clicking photos to open a viewer.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoUplo: Provides an image upload form with drag‑and‑drop, preview, progress tracking, and success/error handling using the upload hook.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoView: Shows a dialog with a large photo preview, metadata, and an optional admin‑only share‑link generator with copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing identity loading, login, logout, and session state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotos.ts: Provides hooks for listing and uploading photos, including file validation, byte conversion, and React Query caching behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useShortLinks.ts: Provides hooks for creating short photo links via backend mutation and resolving them with a query, including base62 short-code generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUploadAuthorizatio: Fetches whether the current actor is allowed to upload and exposes convenient flags for UI state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with an autumn palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional class merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, importing the global stylesheet.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading and modifying URL hash params and securely retrieving secret query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, design notes, known issues, and versioned state.
